mapper.insert: insert into review (review_id, user_id, movie_id, user_rating, created_at, updated_at, reviews_content) values (#{reviewId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userRating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reviewsContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update review set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_rating = #{userRating,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reviews_content = #{reviewsContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where review_id = #{reviewId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select review_id, user_id, movie_id, user_rating, created_at, updated_at, reviews_content from review
